title: Green Wake Volume 1
description: The highly acclaimed, repeat sellout series from writer Kurtis J. Wiebe and artist Riley Rossmo is a riveting tale of loss and horror. In the forgotten town of Green Wake, a string of grisly mutilations leads Morley Mack on the trail of a young woman named Ariel, who is the prime suspect. But when a stranger with startling connections to Ariel arrives under mysterious circumstances, Morley unravels a dark plot with a surprising link to his past.
author: Kurtis J. Wiebe
